Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a global network resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

resource.description: The AWS::NetworkManager::GlobalNetwork type specifies a global network of the user's account

properties.name: CreatedAt
properties.description: The date and time that the global network was created.

type.description: The date and time that the global network was created.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: The description of the global network.

type.description: The description of the global network.

properties.name: State
properties.description: The state of the global network.

type.description: The state of the global network.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: The tags for the global network.

type.description: The tags for the global network.

attributes.description: The AWS::NetworkManager::GlobalNetwork type specifies a global network of the user's account

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the global network.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the global network.

properties.name: Id
properties.description: The ID of the global network.

type.description: The ID of the global network.
